title: Competed with the Croatian national team on European Cyber Security Challenge (ECSC)
detail: Ranked 19th out of 34 national teams overall. Mostly worked on reverse engineering.

title: Participant – IRCN & Chen Institute Joint Course on Neuro‑inspired Computation
detail: Participated in a 5 day intensive course on neuro-inspired computation, organized by the International Research Center for Neuroscience (IRCN) and the Tianqiao & Chrissy Chen Institute.

title: Top 5% High School Graduate (XV Gymnasium, STEM track)
detail: Graduated with distinction in mathematics & computer science focus
